::Kluster::

Kluster shakes his head. "You can believe as you wish, but if you are 
a Maximal on this planet, a true Maximal, you are in a war. You're on 
a team with a commander, and that commander is Iron Raptor. Her 
orders need to be followed, or the Maximals will split apart and die 
seperately. When a commander orders you to cease fire, you should 
cease fire. Especially in a battlefield, organization and order are 
key."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Tarantopulous: On the contrary. I can be a Maximal and not have to 
listent o
> anyone else's beliefs. I was born a Maximal and you cannot change 
that, and
> Iron raptor cannot change that. I am entitled to fire now, or else 
I am not
> later, your call...
